Bibliography

course bibliography and references for COMP 436

The course ‘bibliography & references’ will be updated on a weekly basis with suggested reading, which will reflect each week’s course notes and lecture.

References will be cited at the end of each week’s notes.

There is no specific textbook for this course.

Week 15 - 6th December 2017
  • N/A
Week 14 - 29th November 2017
  • TEI P5 Guidelines
    • representation of primary sources
    • facsimile
    • surface
    • zone
Week 13 - 22nd November 2017
  • N/A
Week 12 - 15th November 2017
  • TEI
  • TEI P5 Guidelines
Week 11 - 8th November 2017
  • Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
  • Dempsey, L and R Heery. Metadata: A current view of practice and issues. Journal of Documentation, 54(2). PP.145–172. 1998.
  • Dublin Core
  • Europeana Semantic Elements
  • Garoufallou, E., Greenberg, J., Metadata and Semantics Research: 7th International Conference. MSTR. 2013.
  • Kartus, E. Types of metadata. University of Melbourne. 2006. http://www.infodiv.unimelb.edu.au/metadata/add_info.html
  • Learning Objects Metadata
  • Open Archival Information Systems
  • PREMIS
  • Simple Knowledge Organization System
  • Steve Museum Project
Week 10 - 1st November 2017
  • MDN - XPath functions
  • XPath Version 1.0
  • XPath Version 2
Week 9 - 25th October 2017
  • XPath Version 1.0
Week 8 - 18th October 2017
  • N/A
Week 6 - 4th October 2017

  • W3C - RDF
  • W3C - SPARQL

Week 5 - 27th September 2017

Week 4 - 20th September 2017

  • XMLNS - FOAF spec
Week 3 - 13th September 2017

  • MDN - HTML Global Attributes
  • MDN - HTML Heading elements
  • MDN - HTML <table> element
  • MDN - HTML <ul> element
  • Wikipedia - list of XML markup languages
Week 2 - 6th September 2017

  • MDN web docs - HTML Global Attributes
